extendedInfo.description: Group-e (Group Everyone) is a free mobile application that makes it easy for users to host and/or participate in group/conference calls. The Group-e application allows you to store all of your conferencing information conveniently on your mobile device, therefore making it easy for you to host or participate in a conference call with a few quick and simple gestures. Group-e is compatible with most touch screen smart phones, and is developed and maintained by the Conference Group.â¢	Host or Join your Conference Call with one clickâ¢	Store your Conference Call Access number and Passcode informationâ¢	Receive notifications and announcements from the Conference Group

reviews.title: Finally!
reviews.comment: This is the best conferencing app on the market! Great job Conference Group.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What an app...Finally
reviews.comment: This is a prefect app if you use conferencing!!! Go-to meetings app can even hold a candle to this app...great job Conference Group...
reviews.author: A Google User
